title: Anglo-Saxon Attitudes
description: The grotesque idol discovered in Bishop Eorpwald's tomb has scandalized, mystified and inspired a whole generation of scholars. Gerard Middleton, one of the members of the excavation, keeps a further, more disreputable secret...Angus Wilson's ambitious novel is the story of a man for whom life and letters have lost their meaning. Separated from his sentimental Danish wife, Gerald is acutely aware of the void at the centre of his existence. But the world is reaching out to reclaim him...
author: Angus Wilson
